name: Avg O2O Degree per Object
description: Average number of O2O links per object (undirected degree).
code: f = lambda ocel: (ocel.o2o[['ocel:oid','ocel:oid_2']].stack().value_counts().reindex(ocel.objects['ocel:oid'].unique(), fill_value=0).mean() if hasattr(ocel,'o2o') and not ocel.o2o.empty else 0)
